attributes.action: Turn off traffic lights at night to save on CO2 emissions, electricity and people's time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Traffic lights stay on needlessly all night whether there is any traffic around or not.  We say turn off traffic lights between 12 midnight and 6am. There is no point being held at traffic lights when there is nothing coming in either direction. This
is a waste of time, fuel and electricity. Our campaign would:
 
1. save electricity (fewer lights on) 
2. save fuel (no need to brake, stop, idle engine, pull away again)
3. save time (get home or to work sooner so fewer emissions).
It's called F.L.A.S.H.E.R. - Finish Lights At Sensible Hours Emissions Reduced
